name: Present Fever
description:
Holiday Is Here ! 

Throw present to Help the kids receive present before christmas eve in this high-speed-action-adrenaline-pumping-game!

Control:

[J] = Low Power Throw.

[K] = Normal Power Throw.

[L] = High Power Throw.

[Space] = Discard Present. (Use this if u think present wont arrive to children).

We use asset from kenney.nl and music from rengoku-teien.com( as far i understand their usage policy is free for non commercial game).

if using this two is prohibitted in game jams rule.  we will take down this game.
